indique_ganhe.indiqueGanheCard: Refer a friend and receive R${{valorGanhoPorIndicacao}} {{bonusBalance}}
indique_ganhe.indiqueGanheInfo1: Refer friends and earn R${{valorGanhoPorIndicacao}} for each referral
indique_ganhe.indiqueGanheInfo2: Refer a friend through your referral link and receive R${{valorGanhoPorIndicacao}} for each referral in your account balance. Check out our
indique_ganhe.compartilheSeuLink: Share your link on social media:
indique_ganhe.indicadoRealizouAposta: Your referral made the first bet
indique_ganhe.indicadoRealizouDepsito: Your referral made the first deposit

regras_indique_ganhe.primeiro_paragrafo_um: Refer your friends and earn R${{valorGanhoPorIndicacao}} in {{tipoSaldoGanho}} balance!
regras_indique_ganhe.primeiro_paragrafo_dois: Interested? Then check below for all the rules and conditions.
regras_indique_ganhe.lista_elegibilidade_text: To participate in the Refer and Earn program, you must be a registered member of the website. By referring users, you agree to these terms and conditions.
regras_indique_ganhe.lista_como_indicar_text: To refer a new user, you should share the referral link in the 'Refer and Earn' section of your account, located in the Promotions menu. The referred user must register using your referral link. The referrer will have a total of {{limiteIndicacoes}} eligible referrals for commissioning; any referrals exceeding this quantity will not be eligible for commission.
regras_indique_ganhe.lista_bonus_indicador_text: For each user you refer who registers, makes a deposit of at least R${{valorMinDepositado}}, and place {{numberBets}} bet(s) that total at least R${{valorMinApostado}} within {{qtdDiasRequisitos}} day(s), you will earn R${{valorGanhoPorIndicacao}} in {{tipoSaldoGanho}} balance. This balance will be released for withdrawal in the 'My Referrals' section within 24 hours after the REFERRED user fulfills the promotion rules. You will have a period of {{prazoResgateSaldo}} days to redeem.
regras_indique_ganhe.lista_deposito_indicado_text: The referred user must make a minimum deposit of R${{valorMinDepositado}} into their account and place {{numberBets}} bet(s) that total at least R${{valorMinApostado}} for the balance of R${{valorGanhoPorIndicacao}} to be credited to the referrer's account.
regras_indique_ganhe.lista_prevencao_fraudes_text: {{nomeBanca}} actively monitors the use of the Refer and Earn system to prevent fraud. Any attempt at fraud, such as creating multiple accounts from the same IP address, will only consider the first eligible registration for balance gain; any subsequent ones will be disregarded.
regras_indique_ganhe.ultimo_paragrafo: By participating in the Refer and Earn system, you agree that you have read, understood, and agreed to comply with these rules. It is the referrer's responsibility to ensure that the referred users are aware of and agree to these rules before registering with {{nomeBanca}}.

conta.contaBloqueadaPorTentativas: Your account has been blocked because you have exceeded the maximum number of Login attempts.
conta.instrucoesRecuperacao: Please use password recovery to unlock your account.

limite_apostas.descricao: The betting limit setting is a feature that allows you to set a maximum value for your bets. This setting helps to control and limit the amount that can be wagered, avoiding excessive spending and irresponsible gambling behavior. Daily, weekly, and monthly limits can be configured for bets.

limite_perdas.descricao: The loss limit setting is a feature that allows you to set a maximum amount of losses you can have during a given period of time (daily, weekly and monthly). This setting is an important tool in promoting responsible gambling, helping control how much you are willing to lose, preventing excessive losses from affecting your budget and financial well-being. Once the established loss limit is reached, you will not be able to continue playing until the next defined period counted as a termination loss.

limite_depositos.descricao: The deposit limit setting is a feature that allows you to set a maximum value for the deposits that can be made into your account. This setting aims to help control the amount of money invested, preventing excessive spending and promoting responsible gaming. The established deposit limit prevents you from depositing amounts above this limit for a certain period of time (daily, weekly, and monthly).

periodo_pausa.descricao: The account pause period feature allows you to temporarily suspend the use of your account on the platform. During this period, the account becomes inactive, preventing access and the performance of activities such as betting, withdrawals, and deposits. This option is useful for taking a temporary break, without permanently deleting the account, preserving data and settings for later reactivation.
periodo_pausa.periodo_pausa_ativado: The pause period is activated. Your account will return to normal in: {{info}}

exclusao_conta.descricao: Deleting the account is an action that results in the complete removal of the account and all information associated with it, irreversibly. This includes personal data, betting history, and access to the platform. By deleting the account, you will terminate your participation on the site permanently, with no possibility of recovering the account or its information in the future.
exclusao_conta.descricao_2: Additionally, we emphasize that this action will also make it impossible to create a new account on the platform if the permanent period is chosen.
exclusao_conta.exclusionPeriodLabel: Inform how long you want to delete your account for:
exclusao_conta.periodIsMissing: The deletion period has not been selected.
exclusao_conta.informe_motivo: Inform the reason why you want to delete your account:
exclusao_conta.motivo_2: It takes up too much of my time/attention
exclusao_conta.motivo_3: I am no longer interested in betting on this site
exclusao_conta.motivo_4: I am no longer using this account
exclusao_conta.digite_para_continuar: Type "DELETE ACCOUNT" to confirm the deletion action.
exclusao_conta.exclusionConfirmationError: Type exactly the phrase "DELETE ACCOUNT" to confirm the account deletion.
exclusao_conta.explique_motivo: Explain why you are deleting the account...

temporizador_sessao.descricao: The session timer is a setting that allows you to set a time limit for platform usage. It helps control the time spent, alerting you when the limit is reached and automatically ending your session, promoting balanced and conscious use. For example, you can choose to limit your sessions to 30 minutes, 1 hour, or any other suitable interval for you, and also disable this feature as desired. When the session time limit is reached, our system will automatically end your session and log you out of your account. This helps ensure that you respect your predefined time limits.

limite_tempo_atividade.descricao: The time limit setting allows you to set a maximum time to play. This setting helps you control the time you spend, preventing overuse and promoting a healthy gaming experience. You can set a daily limit. When the stipulated time is reached, a warning will appear informing you that the limit has been reached, helping to ensure breaks and avoid prolonged use.
